attributes.title: A Karen’s opinion
attributes.review: This man!! I am trying to raise MY children 👬Timmy and Tommy! But this CHEETO of a man is saying Blue Lives Matter. eCuSE mE???? I am trying teach my 14 year old kids the colors!!! #ALLCOLORSMATTER #MOTHERSUNITE #Holy #diy 😇😇🥺😜

attributes.title: absolutely disgusting!!
